net.jawr.web.servlet

Class JawrImageRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.servlet.JawrRequestHandler
      • net.jawr.web.servlet.JawrImageRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ConfigChangeListener

    public class JawrImageRequestHandler
extends JawrRequestHandler
    Image Request handling class. Jawr image servlet delegates to this class to handle requests.
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        servletConfig - ServletConfig

                       Map<String,Object> initParams,
                       Properties configProps)
                        throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Alternate constructor that does not need a ServletConfig object. Parameters normally read rom it are read from the initParams Map, and the configProps are used instead of reading a .properties file.
        Parameters:
        servletContext - ServletContext
        servletConfig - ServletConfig

      • processRequest

        public void processRequest(String requestedPath,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                    throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                           IOException
        Handles a resource request.
        • If the request contains an If-Modified-Since header, the 304 status is set and no data is written to the response
        • If the requested path begins with the gzip prefix, a gzipped version of the resource is served, with the corresponding content-encoding header.
        • Otherwise, the resource is written as text to the response.
        • If the resource is not found, the response satus is set to 404 and no response is written.
        Overrides:
        processRequest in class JawrRequestHandler
        Parameters:
        requestedPath -
        request -
        response -
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        IOException
